changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ratings ( id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, product_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, rating INTEGER, CONSTRAINT unique_user_product UNIQUE (user_id, product_id), CONSTRAINT fk_product FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
